column5: Well I was very excited this week when I was able to get the newest issue of Outdoor Canada magazine and see that Handlebarz musky lures was tied for 5th place in there 25 top gear to have for 2014. I knew that we had made the list top 25 gear for 2014 but had no clue it was 5th until this week and to top it off were part of the centerfold I think this is how Pam Anderson got her start LOL.  I again do have to thank all of the OFC family for the help along the way we will always be great full for this place as I have made so many TRUE friends that will be with me for life. This place is more then just a fishing board and that is what makes this so special for me.  Thanks again everyone.
Congrats, I noticed your gear there when I pick up this magazine a few days ago. You should be proud of the accomplishment.
Good stuff Mike!  I've used your smaller bucktails myself with great success for pike.
Congratulations Mike, that's really impressive !!
Great job Mike, startup on all your baits is amazing, and you never waste a third of your cast waiting for the blades to engage like others ive used

Thanks guys we do have some new things coming in 2014 like our Tantrum top water and two new sizes of the magnum line of baits. If anyone has pictures they want to share with me please email me them we also like the pike pics and other fish that eat them. [email protected]
Not only congratulations but thank you for remembering all of us little people. lol You deserve this for sure.   Art
Lol Art I will always remember Roy he is a awesome dude.
Well deserved!   Congratulations, Mike.
Congrats Mike. That's awesome!!
Thats great!!!  Good for you!!
Congrates   Aint it great when things come to fruition.
Congrats mike !!!! Awesome lures & awesome article too !!!!
Congrats Mr. Parker Well done
Thanks again guys.
Way to go Mike!  Who'd a thought a hobby would turn into such a reputable lure!  Cheers, Ron...
Congrats Mike….very well deserved!
Congrats Mike!!!  Still waiting for the day for the both of us too hook up and share secrets....lol  Musky or Bass.......or both hahahahahahaha  and walleye this spring of course....
That is so awesome Mike, congrats to you!!!
Fantastic news Mike!!  Congrats!!!
Thanks Ron Simon Rolly Joey and will its been a awesome time sofar
Wait to Mike releases his topwater and my secret prototype! it will be product of the year again! Well done Mike all my biggest fish have come on your baits. They are awesome
Thanks John you have been kicking butt with them all over keep up the awesome job. Yes I have released the top water but need to get building more of them.
Not sure I posted this one nice Handlebarz fish!!! Imagine how big she was filled out in the fall!  http://
I don't think I even have that one from last year
